name: Sherlock Orc
description:
Sherlock Orc - The Ultimate fantasy detective RPG

Our game is a story driven RPG, telling the story of a detective, who happens to be an orc.

join Sherlock Orc and solve mysteries while fighting various enemies that venture into Lamplight City 

a game mixing the two genres of noire and fantasy, that use tropes from those genres and combine them in an absurd fashion that will bring something new and unique to the game playing experience.

This game is the final project of our Computer Science degree, and is currently in development. 

Please try our demo, feedback is appreciated
